item.title: Attentive Neural Processes
item.description: Hyunjik kim et al., 2019, arXiv Keyword: Bayesian, Process Problem: Underfitting of Neural Process Solution: NP + Self-Attention, Cross-Attention Benefits: Improvement of prediction accuracy, training speed, model capability.
